edges.head: Rb掺杂
edges.evidence: Rb doping and epitaxial strain synergistically reduce the oxygen vacancy formation energy, thereby promoting the abundant generation of oxygen vacancies

edges.head: 晶格应变
edges.tail: 协同降低氧空位形成能
edges.evidence: Rb doping and epitaxial strain synergistically reduce the oxygen vacancy formation energy, thereby promoting the abundant generation of oxygen vacancies

edges.head: 协同降低氧空位形成能
edges.evidence: Rb doping and epitaxial strain synergistically reduce the oxygen vacancy formation energy, thereby promoting the abundant generation of oxygen vacancies

edges.head: 氧空位
edges.evidence: oxygen vacancies act as reaction sites to promote the dissociative adsorption of DEG, which efficiently acts as SEDs to scavenge holes.

edges.head: 促进DEG解离吸附
edges.evidence: oxygen vacancies act as reaction sites to promote the dissociative adsorption of DEG, which efficiently acts as SEDs to scavenge holes.

edges.head: DEG作为空穴清除剂
edges.evidence: oxygen vacancies act as reaction sites to promote the dissociative adsorption of DEG, which efficiently acts as SEDs to scavenge holes.

edges.head: 紫外光激发
edges.evidence: the redox between Ti(IV) and Ti(III) driven by photoinduced electrons and oxygen enables reversible color switching between white and dark blue.

edges.head: 光生电子还原Ti(IV)
edges.evidence: the redox between Ti(IV) and Ti(III) driven by photoinduced electrons and oxygen enables reversible color switching between white and dark blue.

edges.head: 形成Ti(III)
edges.evidence: the redox between Ti(IV) and Ti(III) driven by photoinduced electrons and oxygen enables reversible color switching between white and dark blue.

edges.head: 着色态Ti(III)
edges.evidence: The decoloration is carried out by the oxidation of O₂. The transmittance of colored nanodispersion increases with the gradual oxidation of Ti³⁺ by oxygen

edges.head: 被空气中O₂氧化
edges.evidence: The decoloration is carried out by the oxidation of O₂. The transmittance of colored nanodispersion increases with the gradual oxidation of Ti³⁺ by oxygen

edges.head: 恢复为Ti(IV)
edges.evidence: The decoloration is carried out by the oxidation of O₂. The transmittance of colored nanodispersion increases with the gradual oxidation of Ti³⁺ by oxygen

edges.head: 复合硅氧烷
edges.evidence: surface modification using composite siloxanes ensures the monodispersion of nanoparticles...which enables the high transparency of photochromic composite materials.

edges.head: 表面改性
edges.evidence: surface modification using composite siloxanes ensures the monodispersion of nanoparticles...which enables the high transparency of photochromic composite materials.

edges.head: 纳米颗粒单分散
edges.evidence: surface modification using composite siloxanes ensures the monodispersion of nanoparticles...which enables the high transparency of photochromic composite materials.

edges.head: 二次溶剂热法
edges.evidence: the crystalline-amorphous interface was constructed to induce lattice strain during the second solvothermal process

edges.head: 构建晶体-非晶界面
edges.evidence: the crystalline-amorphous interface was constructed to induce lattice strain during the second solvothermal process

edges.head: 多次变色循环
edges.evidence: The reduction in photochromic performance after multiple cycles may be caused by the inactivation of a minor part of oxygen vacancies.

edges.head: 氧空位被消耗/失活
edges.evidence: The reduction in photochromic performance after multiple cycles may be caused by the inactivation of a minor part of oxygen vacancies.

edges.head: Rb-TiO₂/TB-CS
edges.tail: 制备丙烯酸酯杂化薄膜
edges.evidence: Rb-TiO₂/TB-CS/acrylate photochromic hybrid film...showing great potential for transparent display applications.

edges.head: 制备丙烯酸酯杂化薄膜
edges.evidence: Rb-TiO₂/TB-CS/acrylate photochromic hybrid film...showing great potential for transparent display applications.

edges.head: Rb-TiO₂/TB-CS
edges.evidence: The Rb-TiO₂/TB-CS/PVA photochromic hydrogel...indicating the application potential in wearable devices.

edges.head: 制备PVA光致变色水凝胶
edges.evidence: The Rb-TiO₂/TB-CS/PVA photochromic hydrogel...indicating the application potential in wearable devices.

edges.head: Rb-TiO₂/TB-CS
edges.evidence: Rb-TiO₂/TB-CS/HEC composite film can be used as reversible printing paper for short-term reading.

edges.head: 制备HEC可重写薄膜
edges.evidence: Rb-TiO₂/TB-CS/HEC composite film can be used as reversible printing paper for short-term reading.
